Sentencas: In order to predict the electrochemical performance of Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs), a telescopic projective Adams (TPA) multiscale simulation method is proposed in this work.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: This method is constructed on the basis of the equation-free method (EFM).
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: A lattice Boltzmann model is used as the fine-scale simulator of the proposed method.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical reaction-diffusion process was simulated by the TPA and the lattice Boltzmann method (LBM).
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results of the two methods were found to be in good agreement, and the TPA method can give accurate results with lower computational costs.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The electrochemical reactions were also simulated based on the TPA method.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The results were consistent with the experimental data, indicating that the proposed TPA method is an effective tool to simulate the electrochemical reactions of SOFCs.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Also, the proposed method is suggested to be helpful in multiscale modeling of other energy systems.
Titulo: Telescopic projective Adams multiscale modeling of electrochemical reactions in tubular solid oxide fuel cells
